N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.1 - Initial issuance

State Regulations
(a) All facilities which have been approved
by the department prior to September 1, 1974, whether by issuance of a
certificate of approval or by issuance of any other instrument which indicates
compliance with the regulations of the department, shall be issued an operating
certificate without application therefor. (b) All other facilities shall file a written
application for an operating certificate, on a form provided by the department
and in accordance with any written instructions of the department pertaining to
the procedures for such filing. Notes
